title: What is MVC and why it is used?
contents: MVC (Model-View-Controller) is a pattern in software design commonly used to implement user interfaces, data, and controlling logic.

title: What are the 4 basics of OOP?
How does ORM work?
contents: ORMs generate objects which map to tables in the database virtually. Once these objects are up, then coders can easily work to retrieve, manipulate or delete any field from the table without paying much attention to language specifically.
